summary: A test module that exercises the WebRTC peer connection implementation, verifying media (audio/video) negotiation, data channel behavior, ICE candidate processing, SDP handling, codec preference logic, and various error conditions, along with focused tests for RTP codec parameter handling.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the WebRTC library to prevent regressions and ensure compliance with WebRTC standards for realâ€‘time communication applications.
